¡Dove Cameron se quiere casar con Thomas Doherty!

07 Nov 2019, 14:30


Dove y Thomas se conocieron en el set de Descendientes 2, la linda pareja ha dicho en varias ocasiones que la conexión entre ellos fue inmediata, y aunque su relación es simplemente perfecta, durante una entrevista con Entertainment Tonight, Dove confesó que pensar en un futuro con Thomas, es algo que aún la llena de emoción.




“Lloro todos los días cuando estoy con él porque es la persona más pura, amorosa, desinteresada, generosa y amable. Su vida se trata de las personas que ama y me siento muy afortunada de ser amada por alguien así. Mi relación con Thomas ha sido diferente a cualquier cosa que haya experimentado con otro humano desde el principio. Sé que esto es cursi, pero sinceramente, desde el momento en que nos conocimos, sentimos que la tierra se movió, para los dos“.
Dove confesó que antes de que hicieran oficial su relación, ¡ella ya estaba segura de que Thomas era el chico perfecto para ella!: “No éramos oficialmente novio y novia. Estábamos saliendo. Hicimos contacto visual y me puse a llorar. Me dijo: ‘¿Qué está pasando contigo?’ Y pensé: ‘No creo haber pensado que tendría el privilegio de sentirme tan vista por nadie’”.
text:
Dove Cameron wants to marry Thomas Doherty!

07 Nov 2019, 14:30


Dove and Thomas met on the set of Descendants 2, the beautiful couple has said on several occasions that the connection between them was immediate, and although their relationship is simply perfect, during an interview with Entertainment Tonight, Dove confessed that thinking about the future with Thomas, it's something that still fills her with emotion.




“I cry every day when I am with him because he is the purest, most loving, selfless, generous and kind person. His life is about the people he loves and I feel very fortunate to be loved by someone like that. My relationship with Thomas has been different from anything I have experienced with another human since the beginning. I know this is cheesy, but honestly, from the moment we met, we felt that the earth moved, for both of us. ”
Dove confessed that before they made their relationship official, she was already sure that Thomas was the perfect boy for her !: “We were not officially boyfriend and girlfriend. We were dating. We made eye contact and started to cry. He told me: ‘What's going on with you?’ And I thought: ‘I don't think I thought I would have the privilege of feeling so seen by anyone.’ ”
